meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something real or brings something into existence.
meanings.sent1: The realizers of the plan worked hard to bring it to life.
meanings.sent2: She is a talented realizers who can turn ideas into reality.
meanings.sent3: The realizers of the magic show made the audience believe in the impossible.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the realizers that turned dreams into achievements.
meanings.sent5: The realizers' touch transformed the ordinary into the extraordinary.

meanings.definition: A person who understands or accepts the reality of a situation.
meanings.sent1: The realizers in the group were quick to grasp the seriousness of the problem.
meanings.sent2: As a realizers, he knew when to act and when to wait.
meanings.sent3: The realizers at the party were the first to notice the unexpected guest.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition acted as a realizers, guiding her through difficult decisions.
meanings.sent5: The realizers' insight helped them navigate through the challenges with ease.
